content:
EXISTING STRUCTURES
────────────────────
### Central Production Hub at position(0.5, 0.5)
Consists of:
- Wooden chest at position(0.5, 0.5) serving as the central resource storage.
- Stone furnace at position(1.0, -1.0) smelting iron ore into iron plates; status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]; furnace_source holds 48 units of iron ore.
- Stone furnace at position(3.0, 1.0) smelting copper ore into copper plates; status: NO_INGREDIENTS; warnings: ["no ingredients to smelt"]; fuel inventory contains coal (2 units) and furnace_result holds 6 copper plates; energy: 1600.0.

### Research Lab at position(6.5, 6.5)
Consists of:
- Lab at position(6.5, 6.5) configured with 10 automation science packs for research; status: NO_POWER; electrical_id: 4160.
- ElectricityGroup with id=4160 connecting small electric poles at positions (9.5, 6.5), (10.5, 7.5) and (8.5, 6.5) with voltage 0.

### Steam-Powered Electricity Generator at position(2.5, 21.5)
Consists of:
- Steam Engine at position(2.5, 21.5) with status: NOT_CONNECTED and warnings: ["not connected to power network", "no input liquid", "no fluid present in connections"]; connection points at (5.0, 21.5) and (0.0, 21.5).
- Boiler at position(-6.0, 24.5) for steam production; status: NO_FUEL; warnings: ["out of fuel"]; fluid_box holds approximately 200 units of water at 15°; connection points at (-5.5, 22.5) and (-5.5, 26.5); associated with fluid_system [14212].
- Offshore Pump at position(-9.5, 24.5) for water extraction; status: WORKING; fluid_box holds 100 units of water at 15°; connection point at (-9.5, 23.5); associated with fluid_system [14212].
- Pipeline Network comprising:
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=14212 at approximately (-6.5, 20.5); status: WORKING.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=14213 at approximately (-2.5, 20.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=14214 at approximately (-0.5, 21.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=14219 at approximately (-3.5, 23.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=14218 at approximately (-7.5, 25.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=14223 at approximately (3.5, 25.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=14222 at approximately (2.5, 24.5); status: EMPTY.
   • PipeGroup with fluid_system=14225 at approximately (-0.5, 28.5); status: EMPTY.

ERROR TIPS
────────────────────
• Fluid System Connection Issues:
  - Repeated connection attempts using PipeGroups with various fluid_system IDs (previously observed: [13524, 13567, 13610, 13653, 13696, 13739, 13782, 13825] and now [13868, 13911, 13954, 13997, 14040, 14083, 14126, 14169]) have resulted in aborted connections. Verify that the targeted PipeGroup both exists and is active before initiating a connection to supply water.

• Fixed Pipeline Stabilization Delays:
  - Using fixed 10-second wait intervals after each connection attempt leads to unnecessary idle time. Replace static delays with dynamic checks that monitor the pipeline network’s stabilization status.
